txt.en: 'Hello again, [placeholder]. How goes the hunt?\n\n'If you are looking for more treasure-hunter's picks, go and speak with Halthor Goldeneye. He will be able to supply you with a couple.'
'Hello again, [placeholder]. How goes the hunt?\n\n'If you are looking for another treasure-hunter's pick, go and speak with Halthor Goldeneye. He will be able to supply you with one.'
'Are you back again? I've no doubt you'll find the mother-lode with these picks!\n\n'Don't come back empty-handed!'

Every fifteen minutes, you are able to return to the Treasure-hunters' Camp and receive two more treasure-hunter's picks.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You should speak with Halthor Goldeneye to receive your treasure-hunter's picks.
